partintro.para: Simpleweb Plugin provides common configuration files and libraries (including common Controller class and tag libraries) necessary for developers to develop Spring MVC-based web applications more easily and simply. Sample codes that show actual cases are provided by Simpleweb VO/Map/jQuery Plugin, etc.
Install simpleweb-plugin by entering the following command in the Command window.
The installation result can be checked by using the installed (mvn anyframe:installed) or the jetty:run (mvn clean jetty:run) commands.

book.part:
Simplification of web
When developing web applications based on Spring MVC, developers should create Controller classes, which will process requests and *-servlet.xml, which will map each request and the Controller class. This process occurs when each request is handled and sometimes requires a lot of time. Anyframe provides a common Controller, which will process requests without creating Controller classes, and Tag Library. Also, it suggests ways to connect with Spring JS and jQuery for simpler and more dynamic web application development. The list of functions provided by Anyframe to simplify web development is as follows.
Provide a common Controller, which enables processing requests without development of Controller classes
Call Business Service
Bind Command objects (support VO and Map types)
Prevent overlapping in form submission
Apply Custom Validator class
Apply JSR-303 Validator to use Model Validation function
Set initial data on the screen
Set Tiles Attribute
Set View name
Provide Anyframe Tag Library to set data to be used in a common Controller class in JSP page
Provide a common Controller for VO for development of applications that use VO objects
Provide a common Controller for Map for development of applications that use Map objects
Provide a common Controller for connection with jQuery
Provide Partial Rendering and Popup functions when Tiles page layout is used
Provide Anyframe Tag Library that can set data to be sent to the common Controller
Provide Anyframe Tag Library that can implement validation of Client in an easy way
